item.description:
Looks like it's going to be a hot one.

I'm still down with a busted arm. Anyone available to volunteer to host? I'm going to be out for a while.

------

Adam, I can host...I could use a little more hitting after my, ahem, "hitting" today anyway.

-------

It looks like the possibility of rain is moving later into the afternoon, so I think we might be in better shape to get our hitting in today (and at the moment I'm very unlikely to cancel due to weather).

That said, I'm going to get there a bit earlier, ~12:30, to hit some serves and if anyone else wants to arrive early and get some guaranteed hitting in, you're certainly welcome to.

Cheers,
Dave
item.how_to_find_us: Ask, 'Are you with the Meetup?' and look for the guy w/ glasses and a right knee brace.
item.name: Tennis Sunday Afternoon at Dugger Park - Medford
